original: CARLSSON, Carl Gustav Wiktor, Disponent, Ljungaverk, f Sthlm 7/7 93 av fastigh.äg C A C o Anna Nyberg, gm Alfhild Brinek-Erik-son. Studex Upps 12, KTH (kemi) 12—15, Sv-Amer Stift :s stip f stud v Massachusetts Inst of Techn samt v elektrokem ind.anläggn USA 20—21. Ing Sthlms Superfosf.fabr AB :s Månsbofil Avesta 15—25, driftsing Alby Nya Kloratfabr AB Månsbo Avesta 25, nu disp v Ljunga verk. Led Sv Tekn.frn. °CARLSSON, Eric Hädar, Köpman, Köping, f Malma, Västml, 18/1 03. Anst i beklädn.-bransch 17—28. Gr eg fma Hädar Carlsson Herrekip Kpg 28, inneh dna. Led Kpgsortens köpm.frn o Kpgs hdlsfrn.
translated: CARLSSON, Carl Gustav Wiktor, Manager, Ljungaverk, born in Stockholm on July 7, 1893, to property owners C A C and Anna Nyberg, married Alfhild Brinek-Erikson. Graduated Uppsala 1912, KTH (chemistry) 1912-1915, Scholar of the Swedish-American Foundation for studies at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, and for electrochemical industrial installations in the USA 1920-1921. Engineer at Stockholm Superphosphate Factory AB's Månsbo branch in Avesta 1915-1925, works engineer at Alby New Chlorate Factory AB's Månsbo branch in Avesta 1925, currently Manager of Ljungaverk. Member of the Swedish Technical Association. °CARLSSON, Eric Hädar, Merchant, Köping, born in Malma, Västmannland, on January 18, 1903. Employed in the clothing industry 1917-1928. Established own company, Hädar Carlsson Gentlemen's Outfitter in Köping in 1928, currently owner. Member of Köping's Chamber of Commerce and Köping's Trade Association.

education.name: Swedish-American Foundation Scholarship
education.description: Studied at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and electrochemical industrial installations in the USA

career.workplace: Stockholm Superphosphate Factory AB, Månsbo branch in Avesta
Alby New Chlorate Factory AB, Månsbo branch in Avesta
